content.detailedDescription: I was walking in a park near my home i past a pine treemail and heard a growl.I kept walking later i walked past the same tree and once again i heard a growl.As it got dark i walked by the same area i listened near the tree but i heard nothing.I wondered what it was i had heard before sor i spoke up and said i know your in there.I sat at a picnic table about 5 ft. from the tree as i looked the tree over slowly i was not going to believe what i was about to see.There in a open branch spot about 2 ft. from the ground i saw this orange hairless head with two black diamond cut eyes looking right at me.It had no ears nose or mouth.About a 2 or 3 second stare and i went wow what are you?And it was gone.But i got a real good look at it up close.I still get goosebumps thinking about it.
content.summary: Large head orange black diamond cut eyes no other features

content.detailedDescription: I was going outside to put something in my car around 10:30pm.  i looked up at the sky and saw a reddish-orange orb. it was silent and pulsating and hovering and i watched it for about five minutes. it was brighter than the brightest stars in the sky. i was in awe, it was beautiful.  then it took off with incredible, almost impossible, speed. in a split second, it was gone! moments later, there were 3 jets in the air moving in the same direction, they seemed to be in pursuit.  these were not normal airplanes!  within a minute of the jets,  there were 2 black helicopters circling low in the area where the orb had been hovering.  it was an amazing experience, made more exciting due to the fact that it seemed i wasn't the only one who saw it! i went to get my mom and by the time she came out, there was only one jet still visible. and then she witnessed the helicopters with me.
content.summary: Reddish orange orb hovering and pulsating then took off with unbelievable speed

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Sighting 3  @~6:15 am on 3.17.18 my husband mike & i were heading eastbound on garfield rd. to see if we could observe further activity. when we arrived at the same location as sighting 1 & 2 we exited the vehicle waited some time. i ended up snapping a couple photos of a suspected star, and a video of some lights in a flying v and changing formation. mike said "that's birds" upon further review this may be a flock of birds but the speed seems to fast so i am not sure, but hopeful your team can find something if it is there.
content.summary: Flying in formation, moving around in formation

content.detailedDescription: It was picture, noticed by accident, you tell me. i dont know
content.summary: Noticed by accident in pic sent by friend

content.detailedDescription: Couldn't sleep.  just sat and watched starry sky with binocs and tasco telescope. saw starlike objects which appeared to be glimmering orbs (could not get photos of them) but pointed camera-sony cybershot 7.2 megapixels and shot pictures at random to east or northeast. don't know what the "light" things are and could not see the craft(s) until viewed photos.  sky, itself is very interesting when pictures are zoomed for detail. all photos taken around 4 or 5 am looking out window.  camera set to iso (high sensitivity) with no flash and zoomed.
content.summary: Starry sky,pitch black; took random photos several dates feb, and mar 2018

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Sighting 2 - @~6:15 am on 3.15.18 i was heading eastbound on garfield rd. to work. i was looking for activity due to the first sighting. surprisingly there they were again in and in larger numbers, roughly 11, and in the same area. i pulled in the same location as sighting #1. facing south i was prepared with my phone an managed to record 3 seperate videos. video 1 they are flying around in formation. video 2 they were moving rapdily around each other, slowing down then fast again, then moved around making different formations. i only recoginized one, it appeared to be the little dipper. video 3 after that they all came together and formed a v pattern and slowly headed north, until they reached garfield rd. then they sharply turned west and flew slowly above the road until they turned sharply again now heading south, flew slowly in that direction until they were out of sight. video 3 doesn't show as much action but that's what was happening during that time period.

the photos have a dim light in 1 and in the lower right hand corner of the second photo are the lights/objects.

sighting #3 to follow.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flying in formation, then grouped together resembling

content.detailedDescription: Couldn't sleep.  just sat and watched starry sky with binocs and tasco telescope. saw starlike objects which appeared to be glimmering orbs (could not get photos of them) but pointed camera-sony cybershot 7.2 megapixels and shot pictures at random to east or northeast. don't know what the "light" things are and could not see the craft(s) until viewed photos.  sky, itself is very interesting when pictures are zoomed for detail. all photos taken around 4 or 5 am looking out window.  camera set to iso (high sensitivity) with no flash and zoomed.
content.summary: Starry sky,pitch black; took random photos several dates feb, and mar 2018

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside a little after the sun had went down approximately mid summer of 1997. i observed a aerial object coming towards my direction about 300 ft away. i was just observing the sky and noticed and thought it was just a airplane. as it flew directly over my head and continued past my position in a south/west direction. (the object had no sound what-so-ever and that's what caught my attention the most.)i observed the object fly past me for another 100 ft and it appeared to start circling back around to my position, at this point i ran 5 feet into my home and told my mothers boyfriend to run and follow me. as we ran out of the door and to the street it was about 30 ft above us; headed in a north/east direction. we ran approximately 200 feet and it abruptly turned in a north direction above a little forest treeline and that's when we lost sight of it. we continued north for about another 200 ft and we arrived at the edge of a cornfield. we had lost sight of the object. we studied the area for about 5 minutes maybe less and decided to start walking home. we walked about 10 paces and as i turned around this object which was more of a luminous ball of red and white pulsating light was hovering about 15 feet above the ground and directly above the only standing tree in the cornfield.  we observed the object pulsating vividly red and seemed to grow a little bigger than that of it when it turned white. the object moved very slowly and without sound towards the west of its hovering position. the area in which it stopped moving is about half a mile past state road 26 almost directly above us31. at this point the object pulsates a few more times then becomes a brilliant ball of red light and it seemed to grow in diameter. it continued to grow more brilliant red and bigger in diameter and then just blinked out of existence. in 2008 or 7 kokomo, indiana  had a mysterious loud boom and and was observed by dozens of people including myself as i sat at my computer next to a window. i observed a brilliant light just before the explosion. ufo hunters had came to town and investigated the mysterious explosion. (i believe the episode was named heartland explosion.) the heartland explosion incident took place almost in the same geographical location as my sighting but almost 10 years apart from each other. after the fact and time had gone by as i was reflecting back on my close encounter, i have come to a conclusion that maybe the object had landed on the ground and that is why we failed to see the object because we were looking in the sky for it. i have always felt like this object meant for my to witness it, and had i been looking on the ground i may have been able to approach and make contact as it was grounded; but that's just a theory. i remember everything very clearly and can take an investigator exactly over the same directions that i have stated here today. i would also, if possible like to examine the ground that i believe that the object landed. i am still in contact with my mothers ex-boyfriend and have asked him about this incident as recently as within the last year of this post. he tried to say that he could not recollect all what had transpired that night but clearly can state at least that we had ran and followed something that night. this night was so vivid to me that if asked to do so i could paint a scene of this object hovering over this lone tree in the cornfield. i would really like to get this out in the public and see if anybody else who may have witnessed this same event. this is the most amazing event that has ever happened to me and is also the reason that i one hundred percent believe that we are being visited by otherworldly and or extra-dimensional entities.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red and white pulsating light, no shape observable.

content.detailedDescription:
Sighting 1 - @~6:15 am on 2.26.18 i was heading east on garfield rd. heading to work. i glanced to the south and my eyes were drawn to the moving lights. i pulled over, at roughly 491 w garfield ave. coldwater mi 49036, fumbled my phone around and managed to snap 1 clear photo. i saw 4 lights in total and the photo captured 3 of them in formation and the fourth was out of frame on the lower left.

sighting #2 to follow.
content.summary: I noticed something flying around and snapped a photo of it

content.detailedDescription: Noticed lights where flickering went outside to have a smoke; saw triangle shaped craft at 33 degrees south, south west noticed three orbs and a cigar shaped craft heading toward port of palm beach got a thought that they wanted food, likely heading toward sugar shipping warehouse... also the power plant is right next to that which explains the flickering lights
content.summary: Triangle shaped craft emitted three orbs and one cigar toward port of palm beach beach

content.detailedDescription:
I was letting our dog out at 3 am in our reno, nv  back yard. first i looked out the liv. rm. window into the back yard and the orange glow of the huge, massive rectangle moving slowing over the neighbor's tall pines was happening!  the homes adjacent to our back area are above those on my street,  due to a hill. we shared a fence at least 50 ' above our yard. the rectangle appeared to have extra bright orange glow to it's outline, like ribbing on a mattress. it was immense, and it moved over the homes up there and  it slowly turned to the south west over the next block of homes. it slowly moved in a ne direction over the lights of the casinos in reno's downtown. our dog barked, but didn't look up. i raced to the front door and watched it as it headed away ne. then it disappeared suddenly. poof! no mention in papers or tv of this incident. i looked online, but didn't find anything.

i was excited and delighted to have experienced this event. my son (29 yrs) and i saw many lights zig-zagging in the night sky as we sat by an apache rites of passage fire pit on a mesa outside of santa fe, nm, august 1992. watched the lights for about 3 hours. sandia laboratory in az might have been working and researching with these objects.
thus, began my passion and deep interest in ufo's. our friend said she had been abducted when young and pregnant in moraga, ca in 1973. the baby was taken. thus, i embrace ufo's.

reno, nv, 7-4-99, 6 adults  watched a humongous, wide white streak of light (like exhaust) with something like a ball-shape in front of it, racing across the southern sky around 5pm. a july 4th gathering on one of the top hills above reno on a deck. spectacular view and we all shouted as this event occurred. this massive "ball and streak thing" zoomed into a large grouping of hills above southern reno area, maybe carson city, gardnerville area.  no explosion. no tv or newspaper info. that night or on the following day. 
[name removed/cms/rjl]
content.summary: Huge rectangular slow moving glowing orange..Mattress shape

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from playing poker at a friends.  i was driving south on hwy 100 and saw a black triangle ufo come into my frame of the view out the front of my car while driving.  it came from about my 5 o clock reference and i didnt see it until it was in my 11 o clock reference.  when it came into view it decelerated from a very fast speed to a stand still.  hovered for a moment. then gradually accelerated into the distance continuing se at my 10 o clock reference.  the entire even happened over 2-3 minutes
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Classic black triangle with white corner lights and slightly larger red light in center.  zoomed in to frame, stopped abruptly, hovered and accelerated uniformly se accross lake michigan

content.detailedDescription: i reported glowing green triangle ufo yesterday that i photographed on flight from dallas fort worth airport. i now think the glowing green triangle was a reflection from the fasten seat belt sign. i dont know this for sure. but i looked online for an image of fasten seat belt sign and there is a green triangle. i feel really silly and embarrassed. sorry. i know tyler from secure team posted it today. i am a fan of his channel and was very excited to see the post. when i read through the comments, someone said it looked like the play button. i know it could not have been that because there was no tv on the spirit flight and we had not pulled out our electronics yet. then i thought about what the fasten seat belt sign might look like. i looked it up and grabbed an image and sure enough it was a green triangle.
content.summary: Reported yesterday green glowing triangle i now think is the fasten seat belt sign

content.detailedDescription: I was out walking my dog the first tine i saw it. i was facing north behind my apartment and was looking northwest toward the school grounds. a beam of light came out of the clouds behind school and projected towards the ground. earlier in the day i saw another beam of light come out of the clouds toward the north and east as i was driving north to go to work. i could not see anything on the ground at either place. i am not sure what they were firing at. it was not lightening there was ni thunder. i was within a quarter of a mile of the second site. thunder would have very loud so close.
content.summary: Beam of light came out of cloud toward ground

content.detailedDescription: Vacationing with friends and spouse at cheyanne mountain resort in colorado springs, co. after a long day of outside activities we returned to the resort for dinner. afterwards we went to the outside patio to sit at the fire pit and talk about our day. at first i didn’t notice anything strange but my friend pointed out a weird light in the sky that just hovered. when i looked to where he was pointing i pulled out my iphone and began recording it. shortly after a 2nd orb materialized above the 1st. once they were both visible they simultaneously got brighter and slightly larger. at the time i was confused as to what i was looking at. there was a lake between the orbs and myself and the lights were reflecting off the water. the lower light suddenly disappeared and another orb appeared above the remaining one. at one point there were 3 visible orbs that from my angle appeared to be in a relatively straight line. i wondered if maybe they were flares but every orb held it’s place in the sky with no apparent descent or change. i tried at various times to zoom in but it would not hold focus. this went on for over 2min so i felt i was neglecting my group. i stopped the recording and returned to the fire pit, which was about 30’ away. when i turned back around all of the orbs were gone. i still don’t know what i saw but during the incident the server came out and my friend asked if he knew what it was. his reply was, “i’ve been here for 10 yrs and have never seen anything like it”, which adds to the mystery. there were other vacations making some noise in the pool but we’re no airplanes in the sky and other than those talking it was silent.
content.summary: Bright large stationary orbs disappearing then reappearing

content.detailedDescription: I had a personal event that sent me on a quest to find something hidden in the bible five years ago. i have now completely broken a system in the bible never before discovered that creates pictorials and messages of the accounts of extraterrestrial involvement in human affairs. 100 percent proof of these claims are available and i would like to expose my work to mufon. my research is well documented and leaves absolutely no room for error. please give my offer to share this a serious chance. it is my belief that could possibly be the most significant discovery in the history of mankind. all i ask is an opportunity to sit down and present my work. thank you for your time.
content.summary: A personal event. a download of information.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking for a spot to set up a quick campsite in a small patch of woods along a public bicycle path in west central ohio,i was cold and egar to get a small fire going and get inside my sleeping bag. the area is a refuge for stray cats , many locals drop off their unwanted or stay cats in this area and some local kind hearted folks feed the and provide plastic containers for shelter.When i found what i thought would be a suitible spot to set camp i set mt bag down and walked a few steps to a large tree to empty my bladder.I had a small flash light in my bag but the night sky provided enough light after my eyes ajusted,suddenly cat dashed through the brush very near me kind of startled me then another further to left,as i looked toward the sound of the last cat running i could make out the shape of the plastic containers in a small circle that housed some of the cats.I then noticed three sets of pinkish orange glowing objects with slight movement.I first assumed the glowing objects were the reflection of threee cats eyes . after watching the objects further ( approximitly 30 seconds ) i seen that the glowing was infact some sort of eyewear worn by three human like figures, as i as i knelt down to watched i could see these figures were handling the cats,and the subjects were wearing a very low reflective off white or gray coverall.After about two minutes all three subjects turned there heads toward me .Thinking they might be animal control workers not wanting to frighten them i stood up and said how ya"ll doing ,with no vocal response all three begun moving towards me instantly closing the 30 ft that seperated us slowly again i spoke saying what are you guys doing out here,  while the continued moving toward me i heared them talking or communicating but inside my head and in a strange whisper i couldnt understand i also notice they were shorter than me.Im 5 10" and id guess they was 8"-10" shorther than me. i turned and ran , i then walked a circle around the area and noticed no vehicals or signs of activity.
content.summary: Encounterd three human like beings  at night in woods in handling stray cats beings had pinkish glowing eye wear with low reflective white or gray coveralls

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was on my to work, and was stopped at a traffic light, i noticed the object moving. at first i thought it was a plane but it had no wings, than maybe a blimp no too small. it was pill shaped, white with a dark band from top to bottom. it seemed to be coming in for a decent and was moving at a good rate of speed. i thought this was odd because there are not landing fields in the norwood oh area. it was not very high up and i lost view behind the near by building. i estimate the size as 30 foot long by 10 foot high. i was very interested in the object it seemed to move slow and silently but my next turn was away from its path.
content.summary: Flying pill shaped object cincinnati

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: my wife and i were talking to a neighbor when we saw what appeared to be a satellite moving from nw to se then a second satellite was trailing the first and when they got near the southeast horizon they stopped.I told the neighbor this is really strange, then just after they stopped two very large orange/white lights appeared very low in the sky approximately 300 yards in front of us.The lights lasted about 3 to 5 seconds and immediately went off just like someone flipped a light switch.The lights had a physical appearance to after burners on a military aircraft but there was absolutely no noise.As soon as the lights went off the satellite objects immediately started moving again and passed the horizon where we could no longer see them.I told the neighbor this is one of the weirdest and exciting things i have ever experienced.The neighbor asked me what i thought the two bright lights were.I told the neighbor i don't know and they were not on long enough for me to see if any part of a object was visibly back lit.We don't know if this was two separate events or if they were connected.I cant get this out of my mind and would love to speak with a field representative.
content.summary: Watching two starlike objects move nw to se then stop,then two large lights appeared almost overhead lasting approx. 5secs.

content.detailedDescription: On a perfect summer day, saturday aug.5 2017 around 3:45 or 4pm, my husband and i were sitting in our backyard. my husband commented that it was a perfect day, and as he lifted his head saying that there was not one cloud in the sky he asked me ''what's that thing up there? do you see that?'' we saw, floating (hovering) above us in the blue sky, a huge white cylinder shape object. since this would be my third sighting (during my lifetime), i immediately knew it was a ufo. my husband doesn't believe in ufos although he had previously seen the video i had taken of a ufo many years ago.  but this one, on august 5th was special.  it seemed so close to us, it was totally silent, no gaz emission, but it felt to me to be a heavy object as it was so big. we had time to slowly drink a whole glass of lemonade before it became hidden to us by the tree tops. we had a chance to really have a good long look at it before and we just couldn't believe how perfectly snow white color as the sun was shining on it. we did not see any wings, or windows, or engine or propeller; there was nothing on it, under it, behind it, in front of it. i remember losing my sense of hearing for less than a minute or so, as if i had become totally deaf. as i watched it, i felt such peace, totally fully peaceful and very very happy. i wanted to smile but i couldn't. it seemed i was frozen into that one feeling of combined happiness and peace almost indescribable.. and that feeling stayed within me until the object was invisible to me because of the tree line. i asked my husband how he felt. he felt the same as before the sighting, no different. 45 minutes later, a couple who lived at our house for the summer, sat on the front porch and ran in the house to tell us to come see the ufos in the sky above the trees! we sat there for more than 20 minutes watching the same cylinder shape object appearing on the south side, then hovering-then path and disappearing as if it had entered an invisible wall in the sky while another appeared on the south and did the same thing, disappeared and another and another always doing the same thing.I asked my husband if now he believed, now that 2 more people were seeing it.  but at no time did we think to film it and that made me so sad.  our guests said that they had been watching them for a long time before telling us to come and see them.  they said they were too mesmerized by them for a while. they did not have the feelings or emotions that i felt during the sighting. our guest said that he was only thinking ''take me, take me' while he was watching them.  we discussed about what we had seen in plain sight, in a perfectly blue sky.  my husband was trying to discredit it by saying there was the greenwood air force base only 30 or 40 minutes away from us, so it was probably an experiment of some kind.  i used to work at the base 8 months prior, i was sure there was nothing like this ufo that could be built there. no way! it was more like a pilot training base to me.  a couple of days (or latere) after this, i reported my sighting on a nova scotia website for sightings and never heard back from them. yesterday, march 18th, 2018 my husband and i were watching some documentaries on ufo and we both jumped with joy when we recognize the exact one we had seen the year before.  we copied it this time not to lose it and saved it on my desktop.  i had tried to send you a report a few months ago but didn't have time to finish completing it as i was looking for my video.  if you want me to send you the video i had taken in taiwan years ago with my camcorder (vhs), please let me know.  while i was working at the canadian space agency in st-hubert, quebec years ago, i had taken this video to have specialists from the agency view it. the only comments i received was 'they could not say if it was or was not a ufo). i was very disappointed but i am sure that what i filmed that night was a ufo as nothing could move at that high speed and change directions, 45 degrees, swirl movement and change trajectory in a heart beat. thank you for taking the time to read this. much appreciated.  yes, i believe.  below i include a photo but it's one i took the youtube - it is identical to the ones we saw. i hope that's okay.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: An unidentified object was hovering above us in the cloudless blue sky - it hovering so slowly that we could see it perfectly. it was a huge cylinder, all white and the sun was shining on it; it seemed bright shiny metallic white.

content.detailedDescription:
[this is a translation of my report to the geipan, the french ufo report center. i wrote this testimony in the evening, just after the restaurant, because i was aware that i had to write right away as long as it was still fresh in my memory. i only send it to you today because i discovered mufon today and geipan does not answer me]

27/11/17, in the evening.

first part
6:27 pm : i'm going to catch my brother at the car-pool at the gaillac exit of the a68 highway. he comes from his school at albi by bus at 6:22 pm. i was 5 minutes late and when he goes up, he shares with me an observation that troubled him when waiting for me. a light in the sky made very fast movements : up-down-up-down several times, with a difference in height of about 50 meters, with 1-2 seconds for each path. he wonders if it's an airplane, or a radio-controlled aircraft, but he says it can not fly that way (too fast especially since there are no phases of deceleration and acceleration, the switches from high to low / low to high are almost instantaneous according to him). in jest i said to him "you have witnessed a ufo brother!" but in the hours that followed, i was less jester.

attached file 1 : in blue, the position of my brother, in red the area where he saw the phenomenon.

6.30 pm : we go home. at the bridge before leclerc (a french walmart), we see the object in the sky on the right. my brother indicates it to me, i try to look somehow while driving... i confirm a luminous object that moves. i think it's an airplane. we keep driving forward and it passes as on top of us to join our left side. the lights of the object vary slightly and gradually in intensity periodically : about every second, they decrease a little in intensity, then become more luminous etc., but they do not blink.

attached file 2 : we see it getting away from us, then we head back home. the attached videos n°6 and n°7 are shot on this road, at position 4 (in blue) and forth.

second part
7:35 pm : we are going to eat at the restaurant. we leave lisle-sur-tarn. on the lisle-sur-tarn / gaillac road (d988), before les fédiès on our right at 2 o'clock we see an object emitting a bright light in the sky that moves relatively fast towards us, about 20 meters high. it will fly right over us. my mother, driving, sees it first. my brother, behind, sees it at the same time than me. but i, being at the passenger seat in front, i can lean forward to see it as it flies over us. there, i clearly see 3 warm white lights that do not blink, and nothing else. two are perpendicular to the direction of travel and one behind, hence forming a triangle. we do not hear no additional noise to the car noise, while the object clearly passes over us and at very low altitude, to maybe 20 meters (at night it was difficult to judge, we just saw 3 lights, but if the object had a dimension of 5-10 meters, then it was flying at 20 meters). between the moment where i saw it and the moment it passed behind us, there was between 5 and 10 seconds. at first i thought it was a plane since we were right next to the airfield but i opened my eyes wide, trying to check for flashing red and green lights (sign of a plane or helicopter) but there was none. there were only 3 continuous lights and being part of the same object (or 3 small flying objects in perfect formation). and if that had been a plane, hence at a distance of 20 meters, it would have made noise. i have already been flown over while driving by an aircraft from this airfield at a similar altitude, when it took off (on the road behind the aerodrome) and the noise characteristic of this kind of plane is usually clearly audible, even while driving with closed windows. there, nothing. and we did not even have the radio on.

attached file 3 : 3 lights fly over us following this scheme.

we continue our road as we talk about what just happened. we make the connection with what we saw earlier with my brother. but it continues.

7:40 pm : at the roundabout of leclerc with my brother while my mother drives, we inspect around to see if we see anything. on the right we see the same constant pulsating glow that moves this time in our direction, at a distance of 500 meters or a little more (position 1, see attached file 4). we take the long road (d968) until the first roundabout (position 2), turn left and it is on this road (d13), until the next roundabout, that i take the 3rd video (attached file n°8). i open the window, my mother drives quite slowly and there are 2 cars behind us, one of which doubles us at a moment, we can see it in the video. the object is on our right side and then passes over us to join our left side. concretely, this last "sequence" lasted about 1 minute (between the two roundabouts, from (3) to (4)). when it was on our right, it was about 500 meters far again and then it got closer quite quickly towards us where there, it was crystal clear, it was only 50 meters away, flying at an altitude of 20-30 meters to the left. i had the open window to film, head almost out of the car, and i did not hear any airplane noise. when it passed at our left side, i took a last look through the front-left window of the car and then left-back and judging by its movement i had the impression that it was spinning around us ... at that moment, i saw that it had a powerful light at the front, and a little one (or several, at this time we weren't under it so we didn't know how many lights it had) less powerful  at the back but it's this one that allowed me to see some part of the object. i can not explain well but there was something between the two lights, it was not a flat area ("un aplat" in french, like in a painting where a part is uniformly painted), it was a complex texture i feel. then we lost sight of it and when we arrived at our destination 2 minutes later, we looked at the sky but there was nothing except the stars.

attached file 4 : explicative map of the previous paragraph, with annotations 1 to 4 (as usual, in blue our position, in red the phenomenon's position)

attached file 5 : detailed view of the end of this second part (beware : the numbers do not match the previous paragraph, but each number is still linked to the same number of the other colour)

later by talking to his friends on facebook, my brother tells me that our cousin has noticed a brief internet break around 6:30 pm, when the object was observed above of leclerc. he lives in a radius of less than 1 km from this place. in the evening we are at a restaurant with a former airline pilot who lives in the area and he asserts that gaillac aerodrome does not fly night-time airplanes.
i realize that all the events happened around the airfield but as i said : no noise, no flickering, three triangle lights, three witnesses ...

note : video n°6 only lasts 2 seconds because i accidentally tapped the stop button after the beginning. i re-encoded video n°8 because i started the recording in a hurry in vertical position and even if i filmed horizontally after that, the file was still vertical. also i cut the first 2 seconds of the video where my mother tells "it's a flying saucer !!!" i hope you'll understand...
content.summary: Flying object turning around the same spot during 2 hours : pulsating continuous light, no sound

content.detailedDescription:
[this is a translation of my report to the geipan, the french ufo report center. i wrote this testimony in the evening, just after the restaurant, because i was aware that i had to write right away as long as it was still fresh in my memory. i only send it to you today because i discovered mufon today and geipan does not answer me]

27/11/17, in the evening.

first part
6:27 pm : i'm going to catch my brother at the car-pool at the gaillac exit of the a68 highway. he comes from his school at albi by bus at 6:22 pm. i was 5 minutes late and when he goes up, he shares with me an observation that troubled him when waiting for me. a light in the sky made very fast movements : up-down-up-down several times, with a difference in height of about 50 meters, with 1-2 seconds for each path. he wonders if it's an airplane, or a radio-controlled aircraft, but he says it can not fly that way (too fast especially since there are no phases of deceleration and acceleration, the switches from high to low / low to high are almost instantaneous according to him). in jest i said to him "you have witnessed a ufo brother!" but in the hours that followed, i was less jester.

attached file 1 : in blue, the position of my brother, in red the area where he saw the phenomenon.

6.30 pm : we go home. at the bridge before leclerc (a french walmart), we see the object in the sky on the right. my brother indicates it to me, i try to look somehow while driving... i confirm a luminous object that moves. i think it's an airplane. we keep driving forward and it passes as on top of us to join our left side. the lights of the object vary slightly and gradually in intensity periodically : about every second, they decrease a little in intensity, then become more luminous etc., but they do not blink.

attached file 2 : we see it getting away from us, then we head back home. the attached videos n°6 and n°7 are shot on this road, at position 4 (in blue) and forth.

second part
7:35 pm : we are going to eat at the restaurant. we leave lisle-sur-tarn. on the lisle-sur-tarn / gaillac road (d988), before les fédiès on our right at 2 o'clock we see an object emitting a bright light in the sky that moves relatively fast towards us, about 20 meters high. it will fly right over us. my mother, driving, sees it first. my brother, behind, sees it at the same time than me. but i, being at the passenger seat in front, i can lean forward to see it as it flies over us. there, i clearly see 3 warm white lights that do not blink, and nothing else. two are perpendicular to the direction of travel and one behind, hence forming a triangle. we do not hear no additional noise to the car noise, while the object clearly passes over us and at very low altitude, to maybe 20 meters (at night it was difficult to judge, we just saw 3 lights, but if the object had a dimension of 5-10 meters, then it was flying at 20 meters). between the moment where i saw it and the moment it passed behind us, there was between 5 and 10 seconds. at first i thought it was a plane since we were right next to the airfield but i opened my eyes wide, trying to check for flashing red and green lights (sign of a plane or helicopter) but there was none. there were only 3 continuous lights and being part of the same object (or 3 small flying objects in perfect formation). and if that had been a plane, hence at a distance of 20 meters, it would have made noise. i have already been flown over while driving by an aircraft from this airfield at a similar altitude, when it took off (on the road behind the aerodrome) and the noise characteristic of this kind of plane is usually clearly audible, even while driving with closed windows. there, nothing. and we did not even have the radio on.

attached file 3 : 3 lights fly over us following this scheme.

we continue our road as we talk about what just happened. we make the connection with what we saw earlier with my brother. but it continues.

7:40 pm : at the roundabout of leclerc with my brother while my mother drives, we inspect around to see if we see anything. on the right we see the same constant pulsating glow that moves this time in our direction, at a distance of 500 meters or a little more (position 1, see attached file 4). we take the long road (d968) until the first roundabout (position 2), turn left and it is on this road (d13), until the next roundabout, that i take the 3rd video (attached file n°8). i open the window, my mother drives quite slowly and there are 2 cars behind us, one of which doubles us at a moment, we can see it in the video. the object is on our right side and then passes over us to join our left side. concretely, this last "sequence" lasted about 1 minute (between the two roundabouts, from (3) to (4)). when it was on our right, it was about 500 meters far again and then it got closer quite quickly towards us where there, it was crystal clear, it was only 50 meters away, flying at an altitude of 20-30 meters to the left. i had the open window to film, head almost out of the car, and i did not hear any airplane noise. when it passed at our left side, i took a last look through the front-left window of the car and then left-back and judging by its movement i had the impression that it was spinning around us ... at that moment, i saw that it had a powerful light at the front, and a little one (or several, at this time we weren't under it so we didn't know how many lights it had) less powerful  at the back but it's this one that allowed me to see some part of the object. i can not explain well but there was something between the two lights, it was not a flat area ("un aplat" in french, like in a painting where a part is uniformly painted), it was a complex texture i feel. then we lost sight of it and when we arrived at our destination 2 minutes later, we looked at the sky but there was nothing except the stars.

attached file 4 : explicative map of the previous paragraph, with annotations 1 to 4 (as usual, in blue our position, in red the phenomenon's position)

attached file 5 : detailed view of the end of this second part (beware : the numbers do not match the previous paragraph, but each number is still linked to the same number of the other colour)

later by talking to his friends on facebook, my brother tells me that our cousin has noticed a brief internet break around 6:30 pm, when the object was observed above of leclerc. he lives in a radius of less than 1 km from this place. in the evening we are at a restaurant with a former airline pilot who lives in the area and he asserts that gaillac aerodrome does not fly night-time airplanes.
i realize that all the events happened around the airfield but as i said : no noise, no flickering, three triangle lights, three witnesses ...

note : video n°6 only lasts 2 seconds because i accidentally tapped the stop button after the beginning. i re-encoded video n°8 because i started the recording in a hurry in vertical position and even if i filmed horizontally after that, the file was still vertical. also i cut the first 2 seconds of the video where my mother tells "it's a flying saucer !!!" i hope you'll understand...
content.summary: Flying object turning around the same spot during 2 hours : pulsating continuous light, no sound

content.detailedDescription:
[this is a translation of my report to the geipan, the french ufo report center. i wrote this testimony in the evening, just after the restaurant, because i was aware that i had to write right away as long as it was still fresh in my memory. i only send it to you today because i discovered mufon today and geipan does not answer me]

27/11/17, in the evening.

first part
6:27 pm : i'm going to catch my brother at the car-pool at the gaillac exit of the a68 highway. he comes from his school at albi by bus at 6:22 pm. i was 5 minutes late and when he goes up, he shares with me an observation that troubled him when waiting for me. a light in the sky made very fast movements : up-down-up-down several times, with a difference in height of about 50 meters, with 1-2 seconds for each path. he wonders if it's an airplane, or a radio-controlled aircraft, but he says it can not fly that way (too fast especially since there are no phases of deceleration and acceleration, the switches from high to low / low to high are almost instantaneous according to him). in jest i said to him "you have witnessed a ufo brother!" but in the hours that followed, i was less jester.

content.detailedDescription: We were getting ready to leave for work when observer 1 noticed a strange substance in our front yard. she then told me to come and look at this strange substance in our yard. the strange substance was noticed because it was out of the ordinary. something told her to look in the yard. maybe intuiton but she noticed something out of place. at 1st she thought it was coffee ground and what looked like cooked rice. the substance looked like it was hot when it made contact with the yard since the snow was melted all around the substance. but there were no tracks leading up to the substance which was strange. i decided to take a picture of it before leaving for work. to me the substance looked like nothong from this earth. the black stuff looks like space rocks or some kind of debree from take off? cant explain what the white goo is but it looks sticky and clumped together like a food of some sort. how can we get  sample of the substance to an investigator so it can be tested?
content.summary: Black rock like substance and a gooey sticky rice like substance found in front yard in the snow. no tracks around it but it look like it was very hot when it made contact with the snow since it was melted around the objects.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on sidewalk in front of my house about 10:30pm on the night of february 11th. i looked up and a formation of glowing spheres came over two story house across the street. the houses are two stories, therefore i think the objects had to be about 50ft up or less.
 
they were moving in formation. there were 4  in a "v" formation , then as they flew directly over me 2 more appeared a short distance behind the"v". the one at the point of the"v" had a dark one behind it.  they made no sound. they glowed and had a mottled look, grey blotches, .
they looked to be about 2 1/2-3 feet in diameter. 

they came from the east, then turned as they flew over me and went sw. i was able to see them gain altitude and watched as they disappeared over the hills a few miles away.

they stayed in formation but not in a robotic manner, more like they were floating/flowing with air current, like birds fly, but slower.

i had plenty of time to see them from all angles. they just glowed, their illumination did not vary. other than seeing the dark round orb right behind the glowing one i could not determine any bulk.  the sky it was not a foggy night. their light was consistent.

my mother was an astronomer. i have been sent watching my entire life. i have never seen anything like this. i see drones in this neighborhood quite a bit. these didn't fit anything i've ever seen.

they were silent, glowy.
content.summary: 4-5 orbs in

content.detailedDescription: Outside my house at 8 pm i noticed an unusual star constellation of 1 bright and 4 smaller stars. then i saw it was moving and thought it was a plane. the one bright star, circular and bright white, made almost a 90 degree turn.  then it hovered. now i thought it was a star or venus. but i had seen it move. so i watched for several minutes until it moved again almost fluttering like a butterfly. i took 6 photos with my cell phone. the object appears star-like in several.  then zooming in i took several less clear photos of something that was obviously circular.  i saw the object moving with my naked eyes so turned on the cell phone video 4 or 5 times for a total of about 30 minuets. i braced my elbow on a chair so the video is steady and caught the movement many times. i zoomed in and caught more movement. the zooming caused a momentary camera movement and the object moved out of frame several times causing me to recenter the image but the vast majority of the movement was by the object.  i even have a sequence in which a plane crosses the screen closer to th camera, indicating the distance of the object and the steadiness of the camera. after an hour i went to bed.  key points. it was not a plane or helicopter and it remained in the same portion of the sky for at least an hour.  it looked as bright as venus but was a complete circle.  it moved many times and moved up, down, left and right and diagonally.
content.summary: Bright circular light, first thought it was a star but it moved, then hovered and moved occasionally for more than 1 hour. have still photos and 30 minutes of phone video.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were on our way to his moms to watch the town fireworks. we were about half way there when my boyfriend said what the [language removed/cms/rjl] is that?! i looked over to my right and saw about 12 or so big orange balls flying across the field towards up. i stopped the car right there in the road grabbed my phone and started taking pictures. these things were really fast and made absolutely no noise whatsoever. we saw that a truck was coming so we got back in the car and drove down the road aboyt 5 feet and parked in some farmers driveway and thats when i got the 4 second video of the lights and him saying holy fucking wow dude! then they just disappeared. we got back in the car again and about maybe 3 feet down the road there was a little bridge over a trout creek that we had to cross. on this bridge must have been ever single frog that was in the water on that bridge. they covered the entire bridge and were 2 inches thick. all i know is that that night changed my life forever! i was truly blown away w/the fact that ufo's are real! i was, and still am, honored to be able to witness something as amazing as i did! i was enlightened that night and now i've become almost obsessed w/watching the night sky. i even have 3 telescopes now! i know what we saw and i know that what we saw was real and i also know that we are not alone!
content.summary: Saw these big orange balls flying across the sky on our way to my boyfriends moms house. what really gets me is the pile of frogs that were piled on this little bridge that i had to run over.

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling on rainier road. leaving lacey, washington. going toward rainier. a very bright object caught my eye. i tried to get a better look, it was reflective and very bright. it was flat on the bottom. and dome shaped on the top. it was by the tree tops. it was sunny out. it was far away. i blinked and it was gone. i tried looking when we passed the trees, but didn't see it anywhere. i even asked my husband if he saw it. and asked him what is that? he said where? but it was gone. it hovered, went toward the ground a little. then was gone.
content.summary: I seen a bright shiny half a oval hovering by tree tops. then it was gone in a split second.

content.detailedDescription: I was beamed aboard their ship they had a silver wand device and a sound device . they took blood and we went for a ride it was no feeling when we took off at all except when we made a decent ing turn and lights like a glowing road just appeared out of nowhere. we parked beside a mountain which had a hanger type doorway i saw two floating hoola hoop glowing lights moving in the air one green one red! i went to touch the lower back of a female. and my hand went through her but i could feel something .It felt like silicone jelly and static fuzzy.
content.summary: My wife and daughter saw a ufo low over farm land moving in same direction as them south east . then next night they beamed me aboard i felt like better than ever before in my entire life

content.detailedDescription: I started researching our county water well n pge n calbtran n davey tree n coastal tree after they removed me from my home n owner sold they did something underground with electrical n than i noticed trees that were historic on dolan around whole area of a proposed nuclear powerplant supposed to be preserved habitats n started noticing all these new poles with a imposters crew of about 4 people putting up electrical towers with satellite looking things and tons n tons of transmitters black for communication n farmers were vacating trees were starting to look like some prehistoric looking animals after cut and with phone camera i kept recording n camara shots screen shots n i found a little fossill tissue looking bone with breathing holes inside n and just kept researching why our soil was turning rust red train tracks sub under power plant and peoples were emerging lots of old people and some people were looking like they just learned to walk and peoples eating habits started changing to like spinich n someone asked me if slume molds.After zooming in screen shots green bubble heads black eyes n sucking black thick wires of electricity that route underground through out county. how do you explain geological grounding completely move overnight and new black top done in rain and burning of red soil or red oak into water routes that go thru or ecological habitats n area mappings. ground all of a sudden has high bumps n than smoothes i mean electrical towers just gone overnight with a crew of 4 n they were very creepy cutting down demolishing historic trees everywhere..We in moss landing use fossil fuel from deep sea salt water n historic trees everywhere n all of a sudden we have red tree trunks n blueberry tree flowers that used to be red. scientific research is mars aliens native red oak historic sea salt water algae all make sense n morphology found rock n than another that just appeared from the ocean water to me with a real sparkle from sun of area to pick fossil up this real big dinosau rock has literaly some fungi looking worms of some sort when looking via camera teeth eyes black lobster like hands a big long nail finger looking thing im not crazy or on drugs i have clean background but all this was made for me to tell someone of whats takung place they are in area still toward marina seaside n salinas watsonvile moss landing power plant all along entire dolan rd oh n they all had white mobile yrailors some had coverings tarps over tops n black tinted windows n they al camped at power plant like camp ground i saw them but no one new i was filming watching everything change.
content.summary: Night shooting driveby without anyone seeing me use camera
